site_name: Stamford Bridge Stadium, Fulham Road, LONDON, SW6 1HS
description: This Council has been asked for observations on an application received by Hammersmith & Fulham Council for Display of various signs comprising of internally illuminated led video screen on the top half of the Nike Megastore building fascia measuring 7m (width) x 4m (High) (to be used between the hours of 07:00 and 22:00 hrs); 2no internally illuminated fascia signs, 2no externally illuminated banner signs, 2no. non-illuminated projecting signs and 16no graphic vinyls to West Stand Entrance elevation; 1no internally illuminated led video screen measuring 7m (width) x 4m (High) (to be used between the hours of 07:00 and 22:00 hrs) and 2no non illuminated fascia signs on the exterior elevation of Megastore; 1no internally illuminated led video screen measuring 5m (width) x 3m(High) (to be used between the hours of 07:00 and 22:00 hrs), 1no internally illuminated fascia sign, 1no internally illuminated projecting sign and 1no non illuminated sign to be painted onto Shed EndEntrance elevation; 1no non-illuminated fascia sign to Matthew Harding Stand elevation; non-illuminated vinyls on Exterior of Chelsea Museum elevation; non-illuminated vinyls to ticket officeelevation
